task_description: Facing the building to your South (approx. 175°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the building height accurately I need to see the roofline, so I should tilt the view upward while staying oriented toward the building.
I’m currently facing north instead of toward the target building to the south, so I need to rotate to 180° to view it.
I need to provide the height estimate now; the main building appears to be a typical ~3-story structure (~3.5 m per story plus roof/parapet).
